author: Seren Morris
title: Should I Wipe Down My Groceries? How to Disinfect Packaging to Protect Against the Coronavirus
description: While there is no evidence that food packaging is linked to contracting the coronavirus, studies show the virus can live on surfaces for up to three days.
content: As shelter-in-place orders are in effect nationwide, many U.S. residents are only leaving their homes to access essential services and businesses, like pharmacies and grocery stores. But some people may be worried about the risk of contracting the coronavirus… [+2319 chars]
